mapper.select: select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_desc, s.shop_addr, s.phone, s.shop_img, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shop_category_id, sc.shop_category_name from tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc where s.area_id = a.area_id and s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id and s.shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop(owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, shop_name, shop_desc, shop_addr, phone, shop_img, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, advice) VALUES (#{owner.userId}, #{area.areaId}, #{shopCategory.shopCategoryId}, #{shopName}, #{shopDesc}, #{shopAddr}, #{phone}, #{shopImg}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{advice} )
